full_summary:
### Title

Better Understanding Canadians to Improve the Client Experience 

### Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: cb-6646-2025658  
**Amendment Number**: 5  
**Solicitation Number**: 100021893  
**Publication Date**: 2023-07-07  
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-01T14:00:00  
**Status**: Expiré (Expired)  

### Tender Information

The Government of Canada is seeking a Software as a Service (SaaS) solution to support the implementation of a comprehensive and up-to-date set of data variables that capture Canadian social, demographic, behavioral, and psychographic attributes. This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of the Client Insights and Business Intelligence Division of Employment and Social Development Canada.

The resulting contract is expected to be for a period of one year, with an option to extend for an additional three one-year periods. The start date of the services will be once the security assessment has been completed and the services accepted.

### Security Requirements

The Contractor must meet the security requirements specified in section 5.0 of the Statement of Work (SOW). The security assessment will be conducted with the cooperation of the Contractor to ensure that the solution complies with the requirements.

### Bidding Procedure

The bidding procedure is open and all qualified vendors are invited to submit their bids. The bids must be submitted electronically through the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website (Buyandsell.gc.ca).

### Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from the following links:

* [100021893-rfp-en-20230622.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6646/100021893-rfp-en-20230622.pdf)
* [100021893_amd1_rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6646/100021893_amd1_rfp.pdf)
* [100021893_amd2_rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6646/100021893_amd2_rfp.pdf)

The deadline for submission of bids is 2023-08-01T14:00:00.
### Closing Note
Please refer to the tender documents for more details on the requirements and specifications of the SaaS solution.
